translations: 使有资格，使有权（entitle 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: This discount voucher entitles you to 10% off your next purchase.
sentences.translation: 这张优惠券可以使你下次购物时打九折。

sentences.sentence: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto.
sentences.translation: 本租约持有人有权使用此建筑物以及所附属的土地。

sentences.sentence: He has a clause in his contract which entitles him to a percentage of the profits.
sentences.translation: 他在他的合同里有一项条款保证他享有一定比例的利润。
